p: The biological evaluation (in Vero E6 cell and in HEK293 cell lines) of a second-generation series of SARS-CoV PLpro inhibitors (namely 3 k, 3e, 3j and 5c) has shown neither cytotoxicity nor off-target inhibitory activity. The 3 k compound exhibits the most potent PLpro inhibitory capacity (IC 50 = 0.15 μM) and the highest antiviral effect in cell culture (EC 50 = 5.4 μM) [164].
